head.title: High-Performance Streaming Data Platform | Redpanda

meta.content: Experience a Kafka-compatible streaming data platform with 10x lower latency and simplified operations—built for real-time analytics and AI.
meta.name: description

meta.content: Experience a Kafka-compatible streaming data platform with 10x lower latency and simplified operations—built for real-time analytics and AI.
Experience a Kafka-compatible streaming data platform with 10x lower latency and simplified operations—built for real-time analytics and AI.

head.script: { "@context": "https://schema.org", "@type": "Organization", "name": "Redpanda", "alternateName":"Redpanda | The streaming data platform for developers", "url": "https://www.redpanda.com/", "description":"Redpanda is a powerful, simple, and cost-efficient streaming data platform compatible with Kafka® APIs, eliminating Kafka complexity.", "logo": "https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6632a83042773c5a1a5f4443/6647694a827e35299ffead7f_redpanda-logo-red.svg", "sameAs": [ "https://twitter.com/redpandadata", "https://bsky.app/profile/redpanda.com", "https://www.linkedin.com/company/redpanda-data", "https://www.redpanda.com/slack", "https://github.com/redpanda-data/redpanda", "https://www.youtube.com/@RedpandaData" ], "address": { "@type": "PostalAddress", "streetAddress": "5758 Geary Blvd. #153", "addressLocality": "San Francisco", "addressRegion": "CA", "postalCode": "94121", "addressCountry": "US" } }

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded',function(){fetch('https://api.github.com/repos/redpanda-data/redpanda').then(response=>{if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Network response was not ok');}return response.json();}).then(data=>{const stargazersCount=data.stargazers_count;document.querySelectorAll('[github-repo="stargazers-count"]').forEach(element=>{element.textContent=formatGitHubStargazerCount(stargazersCount);});}).catch(()=>{});function formatGitHubStargazerCount(count){if(count>=1000000){const millionValue=count/1000000;return millionValue%1===0?`${Math.round(millionValue)}M`:`${millionValue.toFixed(1)}M`;}else if(count>=1000){const thousandValue=count/1000;return thousandValue%1===0?`${Math.round(thousandValue)}K`:`${thousandValue.toFixed(1)}K`;}else{return count.toString();}}});

let v="1.0";document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {function loadanimatedtabs(e){let t=document.createElement("script");t.setAttribute("src",e),t.setAttribute("type","text/javascript"),document.body.appendChild(t),t.addEventListener("load",()=>{console.log("Slater loaded animated-tabs (Slater.app/9244/19957) 🤙")}),t.addEventListener("error",e=>{console.log("Error loading file",e)})}let src=window.location.host.includes("webflow.io")?"https://slater.app/9244/19957.js":"https://assets.slater.app/slater/9244/19957.js?v="+v;loadanimatedtabs(src);})

div.p: Join industry leaders for keynotes, demos, and technical sessions - save your seat at Streamfest 2025.
Get expert answers and live demos—reserve your spot for our upcoming Serverless Office Hours.

div.div: Explore Redpanda Serverless, the fastest way to get started
Run fully managed Redpanda clusters in your own cloud
Build secure, scalable, real-time enterprise AI agents
How Redpanda on AWS provides stress-free operations while using 87% fewer resources than Kafka.
In-depth posts on streaming data topics.
Join our live events to learn from experts.
Tech talks, streamcasts, reports, and more.
Get the latest free Redpanda reports and digital guides.
Dive deep into features and APIs.
Guided courses on building real-time apps.
Ask our dev community your burning questions.
Join leading experts in data streaming and AI to explore innovations in agentic and data-intensive apps.
Redpanda vs. Confluent: A Performance and TCO Benchmark Report (January, 2025)
Learn how customers are building better and easier with Redpanda
Partner list for achieving customer success together.
New York Stock Exchange powers smarter trading decisions with real-time market data

div.div: Trusted by category leaders with mission-critical data

div.p: Agentic applications require context through continuous access to your data without compromising performance or compliance. Redpanda was born ready for real-time delivery, limitless scale, and policy-driven governance.
Best-in-class performance that's easily tunable

Redpanda’s engine is written in modern C++ for raw speed and efficiency. With a single self-contained binary, there are no external dependencies or JVM overhead. It automatically tunes itself and builds on the Seastar framework to squeeze out maximum performance from modern hardware.
All the ecosystem benefits without the headaches

Redpanda speaks the Kafka API natively. That means your existing Kafka clients, tools, and connectors just work — no code changes required. You keep the ecosystem you know, with faster performance and simpler operations.
Built-in optimization that balances speed and cost

Hot data stays on local SSDs for lightning-fast access, while older segments are automatically offloaded to object storage like S3, GCS, or Azure Blob. This gives you virtually unlimited retention, reduces storage costs, and provides the flexibility to hibernate topics or even recover entire clusters.
On-prem, serverless or Bring Your Own Cloud (BYOC)

Run Redpanda however you need: Self-managed on your own infrastructure, serverless in the cloud, or in a BYOC model where Redpanda experts manage clusters inside your VPC — fully self-contained and with zero dependencies on external services.

div.style: opacity:0;-webkit-transform:translate3d(0, 0, 0) scale3d(0.9, 0.9, 1) rotateX(0) rotateY(0) rotateZ(0) skew(0, 0);-moz-transform:translate3d(0, 0, 0) scale3d(0.9, 0.9, 1) rotateX(0) rotateY(0) rotateZ(0) skew(0, 0);-ms-transform:translate3d(0, 0, 0) scale3d(0.9, 0.9, 1) rotateX(0) rotateY(0) rotateZ(0) skew(0, 0);transform:translate3d(0, 0, 0) scale3d(0.9, 0.9, 1) rotateX(0) rotateY(0) rotateZ(0) skew(0, 0)
div.h2: Real-time data infrastructure built for the future

div.p: No bolt-ons. No workarounds. 100% Kafka‑compatible, with no compromises.

div.div: No external dependencies, no operational complexity.
With auto-tuning eliminate the need for specialized Kafka expertise.
Handles operational, analytical, and lakehouse workloads in one system.
Delivers 10x lower tail latencies than open-source Kafka.
With continuous balancing maximizes hardware efficiency.
With follower fetching reduces data transfer costs by up to 60%.
No app rewrites, no tool changes, no vendor lock-in.
Plus native Apache Iceberg support for seamless data lakehouse integration.
BYOC, self-hosted, or serverless to fit any security or compliance requirement.
Your data never leaves your environment with BYOC.
Ensures zero data loss with multi-AZ, multi-region self-healing.
With automated backups and rapid cluster restore.

div.p: Handle any Kafka workload with 10X performance and none of the overhead.

ul.li: Zero-downtime migration from any Kafka cluster
No ZooKeeper, no JVM tuning, no Kafka specialists required
10X lower tail latencies with predictable performance
Monitoring, tools, and apps work unchanged

div.p: Authenticate, observe, and audit every action taken on your data across any environment.

ul.li: Multi-agent applications with traceability, replays, and explainability built-in
Create agents that control processes, tools, and data systems safely and code-free
Eliminate data exposure risks with BYOC architecture

div.h2: Best-in-class experiences from startups to the enterprise

img.alt: G2 Badge: Users Most Likely to Recommend

div.p: “I recommend Redpanda to anybody running a significant event-based workload. It's Kafka-compliant, comes with batteries included, and brings beautiful operational simplicity.”
“Redpanda is the only Kafka-compatible data streaming platform that can cost-effectively and reliably manage the massive scale of the NYSE. When milliseconds matter, Redpanda delivers.”
"We had a large Kafka environment (800M events per day). I dropped Redpanda in and changed nothing and that's when I was completely sold."

"We have operational agility with Redpanda, meeting stringent SLOs while keeping developers focused on high-value work. Redpanda's tiered storage saves up to 30% on storage costs, easily handling 14.5GB/second."

"Redpanda rose to the top of our list because we knew its obsessed over performance and reliability at scale. We tested the data platform for up to 100M users with zero performance blips at 100GB/min throughput and peaks of 100K transactions/second."
Create your Serverless cluster for free and receive $100 in credits for new signups, or ask our friendly team for advice.

div.div: The streaming data platform for developers.

body.script: document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {function loadwwwredpandacom(e){let t=document.createElement("script");t.setAttribute("src",e),t.setAttribute("type","module"),document.body.appendChild(t),t.addEventListener("load",()=>{console.log("Slater loaded www.redpanda.com.js: https://slater.app/10151.js 🤙")}),t.addEventListener("error",e=>{console.log("Error loading file",e)})}let src=window.location.host.includes("webflow.io")?"https://slater.app/10151.js":"https://assets.slater.app/slater/10151.js?v=1.0";loadwwwredpandacom(src);})
